metadata.description: Palace-specific star interpretations for Ziwei Doushu
metadata.note: Palace-specific interpretations for 20 major stars. Each star has 12 interpretations (one per palace).

命宮.meaning: Life Palace - Imperial Presence and Personal Destiny
special_combinations: with 天府: imperial structure, stability
with 四化權: peak leadership power
命宮.personality: Authoritative, commanding presence, natural leader, expects respect and compliance

兄弟宮.meaning: Siblings Palace - Relationships and Support from Siblings
positive: siblings supportive if proper hierarchy respected
negative: difficult to relate to siblings as equals
special_combinations: with 破軍: conflict and separation from siblings
with 天機: communication issues despite leadership
兄弟宮.family_dynamics: Leader of the family, expects obedience, maintains distance

夫妻宮.meaning: Spouse Palace - Marriage and Romantic Relationships
夫妻宮.key_trait: Desire for Control and Respect in Marriage
positive: stable marriage if partner accepts leadership
negative: spouse may feel dominated or controlled
marriage challenges if spouse is independent
special_combinations: with 廉貞: passionate but controlling love
with 天機: complex intellectual dynamics
夫妻宮.marriage_outlook: Seeks admiring, obedient spouse; may have dominance issues
夫妻宮.advice: Learn to respect spouse's autonomy; marriage works best with supportive, traditional partner

negative: may be too strict or cold
children may fear rather than love
子女宮.parenting_style: Formal, rules-based, expects obedience, maintains distance

positive: commanding power attracts money and respect
negative: may be too proud to handle financial losses
tendency to overspend on status symbols
財帛宮.wealth_outlook: Naturally attracts wealth, but must manage ego about money

疾厄宮.meaning: Health Palace - Physical Health and Illness
疾厄宮.health_issues: Hypertension, stress-related conditions, refusal to rest

遷移宮.meaning: Travel Palace - Travel and External Movement
negative: may be too proud in foreign cultures
stands out and attracts attention (not always good)
遷移宮.travel_outlook: Travels well but may clash with local customs or authority

交友宮.meaning: Friends Palace - Friendships and Social Relationships
negative: difficult to make genuine equal friendships
friends may feel distance or inferiority

官祿宮.meaning: Career Palace - Career and Public Status
官祿宮.key_trait: Born for Authority and Leadership Positions
官祿宮.career_peak: Executive, Manager, Government Official, Business Owner
官祿宮.career_challenge: Learning to work with rather than against superiors

田宅宮.meaning: Property Palace - Real Estate and Home
positive: home becomes a seat of authority
negative: may invest heavily in grand homes
田宅宮.property_advice: Invests in prestigious properties; home reflects status

福德宮.meaning: Virtue Palace - Happiness, Fortune and Blessings
negative: may expect happiness as due to status
福德宮.fortune_outlook: Destined for high positions and corresponding happiness

negative: may conflict if parents are non-traditional
父母宮.parental_relationship: Respectful and formal, may lack emotional warmth

negative: indecisiveness due to seeing too many options
命宮.personality: Intelligent, strategic, quick-witted, sometimes anxious and restless

兄弟宮.sibling_dynamics: Intelligent manipulation or complex strategic relations

夫妻宮.marriage_outlook: Works with intellectual partner, but emotional connection challenging

子女宮.parenting: Intellectual bond strong, emotional bond weaker

財帛宮.wealth_outlook: Good earning ability but money is unstable; needs discipline

疾厄宮.meaning: Health Palace - Mental and Nervous Issues

遷移宮.travel_nature: Natural traveler, adapts well, moves frequently

交友宮.meaning: Friends Palace - Many Friends but Shallow

positive: good at adapting to job changes
官祿宮.career_fit: Consultant, Analyst, Planning, Strategy - roles requiring versatility

田宅宮.property_nature: Frequently buys/sells, difficulty with stable home ownership

positive: clever enough to create own fortune
福德宮.fortune_outlook: Good opportunities but restless enjoyment; needs meditation/peace practice
